name: Rolimã Adventures 2
description:
You like a stroller or you've played in your childhood. This nostalgic game will make you go back in time and play Rolimã right from the screen of your cell phone.
Climb down the slope as fast as you can, dodge the cars and trucks and watch out for the most varied obstacles and in the end, get as many points as possible and be the best in the World Ranking.
 
*** CUSTOMIZATIONS ***
Get as many coins as you can to free the parts and customizations of the carts, so you can add more powerful wheels, lighter chassis to get even faster and beat the record of your friends.
 
*** PAINT ***
You can change the paint of your cart and make it even more beautiful, the new update has added 12 unique colors for you to make your Roliman cart even more beautiful.
 
*** RANKING ***
We have now added a Global Ranking where all players will be able to compete for the most points and the best of Rolimã Adventures are displayed. Customize your cart and destroy other people's records to reach the top of this list.
 

Leave your feedback in the comments, we are constantly reading them to know the opinions and what we could add or improve in the next versions.
